source.0b921799:
import pandas as pd 
import plotly.express as px

df = pd.read_csv("../input/motorcycle-gears-dataset/motorcycle_gears.csv")
print ("Dataset Shape:", df.shape)
df.head()
source.cc7eed31:
vc = df['brand'].value_counts().to_frame().reset_index().head(15)
fig = px.bar(x=vc["brand"][::-1], y=vc["index"][::-1], orientation='h', color=vc['index'])
fig.update_layout(title = "Most Popular Motorcycle Gear Brands", xaxis_title="Number of Gears", yaxis_title = "", plot_bgcolor="#fff", showlegend = False)
fig.show()
source.6c38a388:
vc = df['color'].value_counts().to_frame().reset_index().head(8)
fig = px.bar(x=vc["color"][::-1], y=vc["index"][::-1], orientation='h')
fig.update_layout(title = "Most Popular Motorcycle Gear Colors", xaxis_title="Number of Gears", yaxis_title = "", plot_bgcolor="#fff", showlegend = False)
fig.show()
source.ab590354:
import numpy as np

vc = df[['categories']].dropna().value_counts().reset_index()
vc['percent'] = vc[0].apply(lambda x : 100*x / sum(vc[0]))

fig = px.treemap(vc, path=['categories'], values='percent',
                  color='percent', hover_data=['categories'],
                  color_continuous_scale='RdBu',
                  color_continuous_midpoint=np.average(vc['percent'], weights=vc['percent']))
fig.update_layout(margin = dict(t=50, l=25, r=25, b=25), title="Categories")
fig.show()


vc = df[['sub_categories']].dropna().value_counts().reset_index()
vc['percent'] = vc[0].apply(lambda x : 100*x / sum(vc[0]))

fig = px.treemap(vc, path=['sub_categories'], values='percent',
                  color='percent', hover_data=['sub_categories'],
                  color_continuous_scale='RdBu',
                  color_continuous_midpoint=np.average(vc['percent'], weights=vc['percent']))
fig.update_layout(margin = dict(t=50, l=25, r=25, b=25), title="Sub Categories")
fig.show()
source.3755a4da:
fig = px.histogram(df, x="price")
fig.update_layout(margin = dict(t=50, l=25, r=25, b=25), plot_bgcolor="#fff", title="Price (USD) Distribution")
fig.show()
source.34afec1a:
vc = df.sort_values("price", ascending = False).head(15)
fig = px.bar(x=vc["price"][::-1], y=vc["gear_name"][::-1], orientation='h')
fig.update_layout(title = "Most Expensive Gears", xaxis_title="Price in USD", yaxis_title = "", plot_bgcolor="#fff", showlegend = False)
fig.show()
source.5261c38f:
vc = df.groupby("brand").agg({"price" : "mean"}).reset_index().sort_values("price", ascending = False).head(10)

fig = px.bar(x=vc["price"][::-1], y=vc["brand"][::-1], orientation='h', color=vc['price'][::-1])
fig.update_layout(title = "Most Expensive Motorcycle Gear Brands", xaxis_title="Price (USD)", yaxis_title = "", plot_bgcolor="#fff", showlegend = False)
fig.show()
source.498c6ec8:
vc = df.groupby("color").agg({"price" : "mean"}).reset_index().sort_values("price", ascending = False).head(10)

fig = px.bar(x=vc["price"][::-1], y=vc["color"][::-1], orientation='h')
fig.update_layout(title = "Most Expensive Motorcycle Gear Brands", xaxis_title="Price (USD)", yaxis_title = "", plot_bgcolor="#fff", showlegend = False)
fig.show()
